title: I am The Black Tea Specialist Cheat of The Chivalric Order! - Novel Updates
tags: Cheats   Cooking   Female Protagonist   Knights   Magic   Reincarnated in Another World
author: Kanata   Satsuki Kanata   佐槻奏多   奏多
description:
“Is this world the same as the game?” My name is Yura, 20-years-old, and I was abducted and recalled the memories of my previous life.

Moreover, I was suspected of being a witch when I was abducted, but didn’t this game end with the witch destroying the country?!

I was uneasy about being suspected of being the last boss, but my ability to make tea was awakened before my powers as a witch.

In that case, I started a tearoom in the chivalric order’s castle they were letting me stay at.

I’ll do my best making tea, subjugating monsters, and persuading monsters until the kingdom is saved!

※ The tearoom starts business starting in the second volume.>
